meanings.definition: The act of climbing or ascending.
meanings.sent1: The mounting of the stairs was tiring but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the mounting challenge of reaching the mountain peak.
meanings.sent3: The mounting of the hill felt like a never-ending journey.
meanings.sent4: His mounting excitement as he neared the summit was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The mounting of the ladder required careful steps to avoid slipping.

meanings.definition: The act of fixing or attaching something to a support.
meanings.sent1: The mounting of the painting on the wall was done carefully.
meanings.sent2: He used screws for the mounting of the shelf onto the wall.
meanings.sent3: The mounting of the mirror made the room look brighter.
meanings.sent4: Her mounting of the curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The mounting of the TV on the stand was a bit challenging but successful.

meanings.definition: The process of increasing in amount or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The mounting of stress at work was becoming overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The mounting of responsibilities was causing him to feel pressured.
meanings.sent3: The mounting of laughter in the room made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mounting of enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The mounting of excitement for the event could be felt in the air.
